word_mean: 神经痛：沿神经分布的发作性疼痛。按其累及部位或原因分为多种，如臂神经痛、面神经痛、枕神经痛、眶上神经痛等，或糖尿病性、痛风性、疟疾性及梅毒性神经痛等

entry.def: Neuralgia is very severe pain along the whole length of a nerve caused when the nerve is damaged or not working properly.

example.ex: The plant acts as a sedative in treating neuralgia.
example.tran: 这种植物被用作治疗神经痛时的镇静药。

means.word_mean: 1. acute spasmodic pain along the course of one or more nerves
